projects.title: Request for Access - Web app
projects.body: Website that centralized access requests from medical and ancillary staff. Included a control dashboard for the Provisioning team, and a trigger system to send alerts via email or Slack when a request was fulfilled or required approval. Using C#, .NET as an API, with ReactJS as the frontend.

projects.title: Survey Collection and Reporting
projects.body: Multi-tiered solution that allowed the creation of custom surveys, which supported conditional branching and audio/video upload. Survey data was presented to clients via a variety of customizable reports/graphs. Included user management system with data restrictions based on hierarchy permissions. Used C#, .NET, MVC3, Knockout, and SQL Server.

projects.title: Flu Shot Record Collection
projects.body: Replacement for paper-based system. All employees now fill out an online consent form which nurses use to look up pertinent information, such as allergies. Staff uses a web-based UI to complete the transaction. Records are then transferred to a 3rd party EMR.

projects.title: Custom Active Directory Integration
projects.body: Custom web apps needed to use AD authentication but also store roles and data, specific to each web app.

projects.title: System Software Compiler
projects.body: Writing a compiler (Scanner, Parser, Code Generator and Virtual Machine) to implement the PL/0 language as part of a semester project for Systems Software.

projects.title: Customer Service Call App
projects.body: Web application that uses the Twilio API to trigger a conversation between two parties and store the resulting conversation.

projects.title: Security Update
projects.body: Refactored an existing plaintext password authentication system containing over a quarter million users. New system uses SHA-256 hash with per user randomized salt. Required updates to the internal API and rewriting the password recovery system to facilitate secure password changes.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Writing modern web applications using C#, dotnet core, and ReactJS.
Collaborate with hospital staff to create applications that facilitate daily hospital needs and streamline efficiency across departments.
Integrate software solutions with existing infrastructure and 3rd party vendors using RESTful APIâ€™s.
Use agile methodology to manage multiple timelines and complete tasks quickly.

work.title: Software Engineer
details: Worked both independently and led a team to design and implement robust software solutions.
Analyzed existing software to add new features or migrate to modern cloud-based solutions.
Discussed business problems with clients through meetings and emails. Presented solutions and incorporated feedback.
Worked on a variety of solutions including web applications, Rest APIs, mobile apps, and data warehouses.

work.title: Developer
details: Worked on existing web applications and developed small-scale C# apps to meet diverse business needs.

work.title: Software Tester
details: Collaborated with interns and engineers to test large-scale java applicataions.
